game.engine2D

Class Engine2DGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.engine2D.Engine2DGame

  • public abstract class Engine2DGame
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Engine2DGame.GameArrayList<E>
      A special type of arrayList which requires modification such as add(E e) and remove(Object) and remove(index) to be submitted to run on the GameEventDispatcher()

      • getSprite

        public java.awt.Image getSprite(int x,
                                int y,
                                int width,
                                int height)
                         throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                java.awt.image.RasterFormatException
        The method allow the ability to get a individual sprite from sprite sheet using x, y, width, height
        Parameters:
        x - the x position on the sheet
        y - the y position on the sheet
        width - the width on the sheet
        height - the height in the sheet
        Returns:
        the cropped sprite from the sheet
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if there is no sprite_sheet set
        java.awt.image.RasterFormatException - if the coordinate + width or height is of range
